mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard(idx, name, password, subject, content) VALUES (board_idx_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{password}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE freeboard Set content=#{content}, wdate=sysdate WHERE idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS R, T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM FREEBOARD f ORDER BY idx DESC) T) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
